statements: SELECT * FROM training_plans;
SELECT plan_name, start_date, end_date FROM training_plans;
SELECT user_id, goals FROM training_plans WHERE start_date = '2023-01-01';
SELECT plan_name, end_date FROM training_plans WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT plan_id, user_id, plan_name, start_date, end_date FROM training_plans ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM training_plans;
SELECT plan_name, start_date, end_date FROM training_plans WHERE user_id = '123456';
SELECT plan_name, goals FROM training_plans ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT plan_name, end_date FROM training_plans WHERE goals LIKE '%strength%' AND performance_review IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM training_plans WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM training_plans WHERE plan_id = 1;
SELECT plan_name, career_goal FROM training_plans WHERE end_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT review_id, rating, feedback FROM performance_reviews ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM training_plans WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' AND end_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT plan_name, start_date, end_date FROM training_plans WHERE career_goal = 'Software Development';
SELECT * FROM training_plans WHERE plan_id = 1;
SELECT plan_name, start_date, end_date FROM training_plans WHERE career_goal = 'Software Development';
SELECT * FROM performance_reviews WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM performance_reviews GROUP BY employee_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3;
SELECT MAX(rating) AS highest_rating, MIN(rating) AS lowest_rating FROM performance_reviews;
SELECT * FROM TrainingPlans WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT plan_id, career_goal FROM TrainingPlans WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, full_name, email FROM UserProfiles WHERE role = 'Manager' LIMIT 10;
SELECT review_id, reviewer_id, review_date FROM PerformanceReviews ORDER BY review_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, full_name, role FROM UserProfiles ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM UserProfiles WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, full_name FROM UserProfiles ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT plan_id, user_id, career_goal, start_date FROM TrainingPlans WHERE end_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT review_id, user_id, reviewer_id, review_date, performance_score FROM PerformanceReviews WHERE performance_score >= 90 ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, full_name, email FROM UserProfiles WHERE full_name LIKE '%John%' OR full_name LIKE '%Doe%';
SELECT * FROM User_Profile;
SELECT user_id, full_name, email FROM User_Profile WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT review_id, user_id, feedback FROM Performance_Review WHERE review_score > 3;
SELECT course_id, course_name, description FROM Training_Course WHERE difficulty_level < 3;
SELECT user_id, course_id, enrollment_date FROM User_Enrollment ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT full_name, email FROM User_Profile WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Performance_Review WHERE review_score > 80;
SELECT user_id, full_name, email, career_goal FROM User_Profile WHERE user_id BETWEEN 5 AND 10 ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT course_name, description FROM Training_Course WHERE difficulty_level > 3 ORDER BY course_name ASC;

SELECT User_Profile.full_name, Training_Course.course_name, User_Enrollment.enrollment_date FROM User_Profile JOIN User_Enrollment ON User_Profile.user_id = User_Enrollment.user_id JOIN Training_Course ON User_Enrollment.course_id = Training_Course.course_id WHERE User_Profile.user_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM training_plans;
SELECT plan_name, career_goal FROM training_plans WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_id, name, department FROM employee_profiles ORDER BY department DESC;
SELECT review_id, reviewer, rating FROM performance_reviews WHERE rating >= 4;
SELECT log_date, log_details FROM progress_logs WHERE progress_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM training_plans;
SELECT plan_name, career_goal, start_date, end_date FROM training_plans WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, reviewer, rating, feedback FROM performance_reviews WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY review_date ASC;
SELECT employee_id, name, job_title, department FROM employee_profiles WHERE department = 'Engineering' ORDER BY employee_id;
SELECT goal, target_completion_date, current_status FROM goals_progress WHERE target_completion_date >= '2022-06-01' ORDER BY target_completion_date;
